R-C00001.description: Package must be a valid .zip file or an unarchived directory

R-C00002.description: Package must have a valid MANIFEST.json file

R-C00003.description: Package must have atleast one artifact

R-C00004.description: MANIFEST.json must have a 'name' field containing string data

R-C00005.description: MANIFEST.json must have a 'description' field containing string data

R-C00006.description: MANIFEST.json must have a 'data' field containing array data

R-C00007.description: Items in 'data' field in MANIFEST.json must 'file' and 'type' properties and can have 'isBase' properties. All must be string. 'isBase' must be 'true' or 'false'

R-C00008.description: 'data' field in MANIFEST.json must have atleast one artifact entry

R-C00009.description: 'data' field in MANIFEST.json must list all files present in package

R-C00010.description: All files listed in 'data' field in MANIFEST.json must be present in package

R-C00011.description: 'data' field in MANIFEST.json must not have duplicate entries

R-C00012.description: Each HELM artifact must have 'isBase' defined

R-C00013.description: HELM artifacts must have prefix 'helm_'. HEAT artifacts should not contain keyword 'HELM

R-C00015.description: One of the HELM artifacts should have “isBase” true in MANIFEST.json

R-C00017.description: appVersion should be given in Chart.yaml

R-C00018.description: appVersion in Chart.yaml, if given, should be in quotes

R-C00019.description: Helm chart should have a LICENSE file

R-C00020.description: Helm chart should have a README.md file

R-C00021.description: Helm chart should have templates/NOTES.txt if 'templates' folder exists

R-C00022.description: Helm chart should pass integrity check ('helm verify')
